text:
您好:
[redacted_name]
*信用卡授權*
-所有預訂均需使用有效的信用卡以確保您的預訂。
-酒店接受Visa，Mastercard和JCB信用卡。 也接受中國銀聯。
-酒店將在抵達前7天進行預授權交易，以確保預訂。 酒店進行交易後，將發送通知。
-信用卡預先授權即為凍結您信用卡之額度，但尚未正式扣款。 等您抵達現場入住時可選擇使用同一張信用卡完成此交易。
trans:
Dear
[redacted_name],
*Credit Card Authorization*
- The reservation can only be made by providing a valid credit card.
- The hotel accepts Visa, Mastercard, JCB, and China UnionPay cards.
- 7 days prior to the arrival, the hotel will carry out a pre-authorization transaction to secure the reservation. Post transaction notification will be sent.
- Pre-authorization on your credit card means the amount is frozen but not yet charged. You may complete the transaction using the same credit card upon check-in.
